title: Basic Greetings and Farewells
description: Improve your French speaking skills with basic greetings and farewells. Focus on clear pronunciation and appropriate intonation.
instructions: Below, you'll find a list of common French greetings and farewells.
Your task is to record yourself speaking each phrase.
Ensure your pronunciation matches the provided text as closely as possible.
Try to maintain a natural and clear speaking pace.
After recording each phrase, listen to your recording and compare it to the text.
Focus on intonation, clarity, and fluency.
Repeat the recording process as many times as needed to improve your pronunciation.

scoring.8-10 correct pronunciations: Excellent! Your pronunciation is clear and accurate. You demonstrate a strong command of basic French.
scoring.5-7 correct pronunciations: Good! Your pronunciation is mostly correct, with a good grasp of basic French. There are some areas to refine for improved clarity.
scoring.2-4 correct pronunciations: Fair. You have a basic ability to pronounce French phrases, but there are several areas needing significant improvement.
scoring.0-1 correct pronunciations: Needs improvement. Consider practicing more to enhance your French pronunciation skills, or seek additional resources for learning.
